body:
I remembered something funny to do here, a competition (not that much) of how many languages you know. I just know 2 languages: Portuguese and English (I don't believe it, you know English?!)
NOTE: Computer Languages don't count!
Bye!!!
~RedBoyS3

title: How many languages do you know?
